ai.summary: A 4.8 km easy hike on an accessible route in the UK, designed for a comfortable, low-effort outing with flat terrain and minimal elevation.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-surfaced paths such as paved or compact gravel. Wide routes with gentle gradients; few steps or stairs. Check for seasonal maintenance and gate widths if using mobility aids like a wheelchair or stroller.
ai.safety_notes: Follow marked trails and local regulations. UK weather can change quickly—dress in layers and bring rain protection. Stay hydrated, carry a small first aid kit, and have a charged phone for emergencies. If using mobility aids, verify gate widths and surface consistency in advance.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn; can be enjoyed year-round with proper clothing and waterproofing.

seo.title: Accessible Route, Runnymede – Easy 4.8 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the Accessible Route at Runnymede in the UK: a flat, easy 4.8 km hike with accessible paths, suitable for all abilities. Safety tips and gear guide included.
